description: Conversion of existing garage into habitable space, erection of ramp.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The development to which this permission relates shall be carried out in accordance with the materials specified on the approved plans and on the submitted application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the local planning authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development, in accordance with Policy D3 of the London Plan 2021 and Policies CS8 and DM10 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.

The development hereby permitted shall only be used for a purpose ancillary or incidental, or both, to the residential use of the dwelling house currently known as 40 Coppard Gardens, Chessington, KT9 2GE', as set out in the submitted application form signed 19.07.2023, unless otherwise first agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: The proposal has been assessed as householder development and were the habitable accommodation to be used as a separate unit of accommodation this would have implications for neighbouring amenity, standard of accommodation and levels of on-site car parking.
